alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Jackson; Johnson; Pope; Saline; Union; Williamson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 11:22PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Union, northern Pope, northern Johnson, Williamson, Saline, southeastern Jackson and Gallatin Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1121 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eldorado to near Cedar Lake Area. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Eldorado around 1125 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Equality, Ridgway, Shawneetown, Goreville and Lake Of Egypt Area. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 12. Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 34 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin; Jackson; Johnson; Pope; Saline; Union; Williamson
